channel.title: Hosting
channel.description:
Don't know if I am aloud to do this but.. I need a hoster.. Apply here,
I will be using Evilscape V2. I asked moparRuler if I could host it and just leave it as it is and give him full credits. He said YES! I will try to get him to post here to prove he said I could.
App
[code]Computer Type: Internet Connections: Hosting Time: IE. 24/7 Can Host NO-IP: [/code]
Use this application and see if you get accepted. If I accept someone you can still be backup hoster. You cannot make people staff! I decide who is staff..
